title: Riot Exposed
body: Rito keeps champs strong because they sell skins, Rito is all about the money, if you don't believe me, when was the last time you saw a new Heimer skin, or a Urgot, or even a Karthas. But no, we just see champs like Ahri who keeps getting skins, that honestly aren't that great.

replies.body: Karthus recently got a lightsbane skin which looks sick. The other two are slated for reworks and won't recieve skins until its done.
Heimer is slated for rework? Where did you hear that?

Honestly, I don't know where they've said it. They've just shelfed him in his underpowered state like they did to Eve while waiting for her rework because if he is strong, he is oppressively strong due to the nature of his current turrets.

So you're telling me, that a for-profit company wants to make money???? Holy shit it's almost like we live in a capitalist country or something. 

I'm sure if they didn't make as much money the servers and quality of game would be the exact same, if not better.
urgot skin incoming with the rework with bundles and "sales" god forbid a company that has a free to play game try to make money. you don't have to spend money to play this game at all

Hmm... let's see... we got Heartseeker Lucian wehn he wasn't super viable, Darius is popular and he's getting his first skin after a couple years without one, Mordekaiser got king of clubs a year or two back, etc.

Also, yeah. They're selling skins for popular champs. They do need to make money, you know.
well i have nothing to do with riots policy.i am not against what riot is doing with skins,but my opinion is that people won't believe what they don't want. at least eazilly.
Only 3 or 4 more patches until Lee gets the nerf he deserves
